name: Audi RS Q8
description: The price of Audi RS Q8, a 5 seater SUV, starts from  of Rs. 2.22 Crore. It is available in 1 variant, with an engine of 3996 cc and a choice of 1 transmission: Automatic. RS Q8 has an NCAP rating of 5 stars and comes with 8 airbags. Audi RS Q8 is available in 7 colours. Users have reported a mileage of 8 kmpl for RS Q8.
